tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE attendance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  time_in TIME,
  time_out TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Attendance (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
employee_id INT,
date DATE,
status VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE Shifts (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
shift_name VARCHAR,
start_time TIME,
end_time TIME);

CREATE TABLE Schedules (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
employee_id INT,
shift_id INT,
date DATE);
